ygData.subject: Re: Lil bit from an Enchanter
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know...my skill in conjuration is 40 methinks, and it casts about as fast as a Chaotic feedback. If I time it EXACTLY after the enemy attack, I can get
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know...my skill in conjuration is 40 methinks, and it casts about as fast as a Chaotic feedback.
If I time it EXACTLY after the enemy attack, I can get it off right as they hit again.

Note: Not circle 4 pet, level 4, Juli's Animation

On Wednesday, May 19, 1999 7:01 AM, TkAdam@... [SMTP:TkAdam@...] wrote:
> From: TkAdam@...
>
> In a message dated 5/18/99 8:09:50 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
> anubis@... writes:
>
> > but being able to cast a L4 pet
> > inbetween enemy attacks, get the pet to taunt the attacker and have three
> > or four hits to high tail to a zone is an advantage.
>
> only with the absolute luckiest of luck could one ever get a pet spell off
> while being attacked. It takes almost 3 combat rounds for that spell to
> go... so you would have to either be missed all 3 times (yeah right) or make
> 3 "recoveries" during that time (you are more likely to be struck by
> lightning!!!)
>
> Again... I agree with the others ... enough "I hate my class" posts please!!!
>
> Sonoroud.
>
